amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to require Congress to approve by vote any regulation with an economic impact over $1 billion instead of $100 million.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to require Congress to approve by vote any regulation with an economic impact over $1 billion instead of $100 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 285 (Roll no. 261).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Houlahan.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 285 (Roll no. 261).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
